General.Name: North Springs Resources Corp
General.Description: Medcann Industries, Inc. focuses on the manufacture and assembly of medicines, cosmetics, and health treatment products and drinks. The company was formerly known as North Springs Resources Corp. and changed its name to Medcann Industries, Inc. in January 2023. Medcann Industries, Inc. was founded in 2009 and is based in Riverview, Florida.
General.Address: 11705 Boyette Road, Riverview, FL, United States, 33569
